attributes.review: I opened the app and I saw a stalk of corn hell I got scared my microwave broke my refrigerator grew two legs and ran out the house while I was on the app and pushed my sister of the off the roof of the house
attributes.title: Shame

attributes.review: I got this app and immediately starter draining my battery crazy fast! Then my clock and a painting fell off the table even though theres nothing touching it, this has never happened before! I KNOW IT IS THIS APP! THE PRESIDENT AND THE APP IS EVIL!!
attributes.title: NEVER DOWNLOAD OR SUPPORT TRUMP

attributes.review: This power hungry, racist, homophobic, sexist person I have ever had the displeasure of even hearing about. He is a joke of persona & deserves to be kicked out of office and never be allowed close to politics ever.
attributes.title: Most incompetent president ever

attributes.review: I opened the app and I felt as if my soul had left my body. I want to bleach my eyes. I threw up continuously for 20 mins. jesus- never again. The presence of the app if disgusting.
attributes.title: I want to bleach my eyes 👁👄👁

attributes.review: When i opened the app there was a very disturbing photo of a rotting 74 year old cheeto. Made me drop and crack my phone!! Showing such images should be illegal! Worst app EVER🤢
attributes.title: This app cracked my phone🤬

attributes.review: this app is horrific i’ve never used an app that had worse graphics!! i don’t rate often but i can’t express how terrible this is to be in the app store
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: I was so UPSET when I got a notification from The Donald Trump App asking me to send pictures of my self NAKED IN NUDE through the app also forced me to put my card number in and took my money ???? HORRIBLE APP TAKE IT DOWN!!!! VOTE 2020 MAKE AMERICA GREAT
attributes.title: ASKED ME FOR A CARD INFO AND CHILD PORNOGRAPHY????

attributes.review: downloaded this app to stay up to date with politics and i could barley keep the app open without it crashing the next day i woke up too multiple viruses on my device and a broken phone that kept showing me nude images from the app 0/10 don’t recommend.
attributes.title: awful...just awful

attributes.review: my experience with this app was HORRIBLE. it was horrendous. who let a cheeto have an app😾😾. the service i got with this was DISGUSTING. he should be ashamed of how bad the app is. the app was so REVOLTING and REPULSIVE that he should go hide in the bunker again.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: When is Cheeto’s mascot start running for president? God this app is just terrible and all they want is your number. No that’s my private info!
attributes.title: The Worst App of all time.
